name: The Exceptional Chateau in Aix
description:
DESCRIPTION
Situated at an altitude of 400m, in the heart of a private 300-hectare estate, this 17th-century family property was home to numerous dukes and duchesses of Provence. Surrounded by vineyards, olive groves, almond trees, truffle oaks and landscaped gardens, this property, with its exceptional architecture and incomparable elegance, immerses you in a unique atmosphere.
Its 11 bedrooms and suites, its vast reception rooms are decorated with noble materials and period furniture. Each room, each bedroom, has its own decor that combines contemporary works and historical objects. The property offers exceptional views on the Alpilles mountains, a large woodland park and 150 hectares of vineyards. Numerous activities are offered on site: agrotourism, hiking or cycling in the vineyards, tennis, and a hot tub in one of the towers overlooking the vineyards ideal for the newly weds. A second villa on the estate with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms is also available for rent for an additional fee.
CONDITIONS:
The reception takes place outside in the French gardens, by the pool, or by the vineyards. It is advisable to rent a marquee at the expense of the bride and groom.
It is mandatory to have a wedding planer, to rent a generator and an outside toilet.
No noise limit or time limit for music.
200 people maximum outside.
Maximum 34 people sleeping on site.
Many parking spots on-site.
RATES:
Events/reception: 45 000€ tax included for 3 nights, 15 bedrooms (including the castle and the extra villa). In 2023, the price will be 47 250€ including all taxes.
Only resident guests have access to the interior of the castle and the extra villa.
Services included: daily housekeeping, linens, laundry, preparation of breakfast for people sleeping on-site.
Services available upon request: private chef, sommelier, babysitter, caterer, furniture (tables, chairs…), sounds and lights, decoration, flowers…and many more.
Nearest Airport: Marseille-Provence (30 minutes)
Aix en Provence TGV (20 minutes) /Marseille Saint Charles (30 minutes) /Avignon TGV (40 minutes)
Activities:
On site: tennis, pétanque, 12 adult and 2 children’s mountain bikes, table tennis,
Upon request: gym, yoga, Pilates and cooking classes, 2 or 4 handed massage amidst the vines or in the rose garden, children’s workshops, musicians, discovery of the château’s historical heritage, wine safari-biodiversity tour, truffle cultivation and tastings, helicopter or microlight aircraft ride over the vineyard...
In the immediate vicinity: guided hikes or e-bike tours to Sainte Victoire, guided sightseeing tour to Aix en Provence, discovery of the Lubéron, the Alpilles, helicopter rides, day at a thermal spa.
If you would like any further information then please do get in touch.
